summary: Data Analyst with expertise in SQL, Python, Power BI, dashboards & data-driven decision making.
highlights: Delivered insights from complex, global datasets covering 45+ countries, enabling stakeholders to make data-driven decisions across multiple business functions.
Improved analytical reliability through continuous data validation, anomaly detection, and root cause analysis, ensuring trustworthy reporting and consistent performance metrics.

tech.summary: Built Flask microservices and APIs to optimize healthcare workflows.
highlights: Designed and deployed Flask-based microservices for centralized medicine management, enabling seamless data exchange across legacy and modern APIs.
Created robust REST APIs for HIMS and pharmacy operations accelerated reporting and automated key workflows, reducing processing times by 30%.
Implemented secure authentication protocols JWT, modernized front-end modules using React, and streamlined state management zustand, tailwind CSS.
